overview_of_class: This is the first quarter in a three-quarter sequence covering quantum field theory. Topics discussed in the sequence include: Lagrangian field theory, relativistic Lagrangians and relativistic wave equations, symmetries and conservation laws, canonical quantization, covariant perturbation theory, the S-Matrix, cross sections and lifetimes, elementary processes of quantum electrodynamics, quantum chromodynamics, and electroweak processes.
name: Quantum Field Theory
subject: PHYSICS
